text: "I Learned from the Best" is a 1999 song by American singer Whitney Houston and is the fifth and final single from her fourth studio album My Love Is Your Love (1998). It went to number 1 in Romania, number 6 in Finland, number 8 in Spain, number 10 in Hungary, number 15 in the Czech Republic, number 18 in Ireland, number 19 in the United Kingdom, number 23 in Sweden and number 27 in the United States. Category:1999 songs Category:Whitney Houston songs
title: I Learned from the Best
